title: Ahri gets another skin soo quickly all the time!
body:
Not only she is in need of nerfs for a loong time now, but she also gets too much love from you riot! it's so obvious she is like your favorite daughter that it sickens me, you realeased popstar, then, like a year later there was Challenger Ahri (this January or February if I can recall...) now this Academy Ahri skin.

 Meanwhile Yorick, Kennen, Cassiopeia, AZIR (wtf Ekko is receiving a skin first? for real?), Zyra and poor Diana have been neglected for a long time. Ahri is so easy and stupid to use... I main Cassiopeia, she requires some actual endeavor to win with her. I rarely pick Ahri, I used her recently and I was soo impresed of how broken she is, she is too strong and safe and easy to use, for someone like me who doesn't really use that type champion with that playstyle, it was really easy to steamroll the game. She's like almost reaching that 54% win rate with a relevant pick rate aswell. If Cassiopeia gets more that 10% with a 53% win rate there would be no doubt that she would be nerfed to the ground simply because she is not the typical anime girl that every wannabe otaku girl makes a cosplay of (ejem, a lot of Ahri's cosplay...). 

So yeah, I'm tired of the cool kids in league (Ahri, jinx, vayne...) that always and obviously get more love simply because they never nerf them even when they need it. Specially I hate Ahri now because of all the love she gets, she is not a deep and interesting character, just a slutty fox, seems like  not only in real life slutty people get the attention but in here too lol.
